title: 45. Your compliance team requested all audit logs are stored for 10 years and to allow access for external auditors to view. You want to follow Google recommended practices. What should you do?(Choose two)E. Export audit logs to BigQuery via an export sink.
alternatives: A. Create an account for auditors to have view access to Stackdriver Logging.
B. Export audit logs to Cloud Storage via an export sink.
C. Export audit logs to Splunk via a Pub/Sub export sink.
D. Generate a signed URL to the Stackdriver export destination for auditors to access.
